actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to extend to hawks and owls the protection now accorded to bald and golden eagles.

summary.text: Provides the whoever unlawfully takes, possesses, sells, purchases, barters, or offers to sell, purchase, or barter, transport, export or import at any time or in any manner any hawk or owl alive or dead, or any part, nest, or egg thereof, shall be fined not more than $500 or imprisoned not more than six months, or both. (Amends 16 U.S.C. 668, 668a)

titles.title: A bill to extend to hawks and owls the protection now accorded to bald and golden eagles.
